subject: Baseball
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: For lack of a better option, the much-maligned Luis Castillo may win the Mets’ second-base job. It could have been a different story if Reese Havens had stayed healthy.
snippet: For lack of a better option, the much-maligned Luis Castillo may win the Mets’ second-base job. It could have been a different story if Reese Havens had stayed healthy.
